nodes.text: Tellus T'arch was a female Mandalorian who served under the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Third Galactic War. She was present in the Imperial Command Center on Ossus during the Empire's invasion of the planet. She wore black Mandalorian tracker armor.
Tellus T'arch serves as a skill trainer for the Bounty Hunter class on the Imperial Side at Ossus within the game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
